    P

    plotStockData(ArrayList<StockData>, PApplet, Rectangle) - Method in class graphing.GraphingManager
    Draws the provided list of stock data graphs on the given Processing sketch within the specified graph drawing area.
    predictFutureHybrid(StockData, double) - Static method in class prediction.Prediction
    Generates a sequence of hybrid future predictions by iteratively predicting the next point using a combination of SMA, linear regression, Holt smoothing, and sentiment adjustments.
    predictFutureHybrid(StockData, double) - Method in class prediction.PredictionManager
    Generates a hybrid future price prediction by combining multiple prediction methods with sentiment score adjustment.
    predictFutureHybridSinglePoint(StockData, double) - Static method in class prediction.Prediction
    Produces a single next-day hybrid price prediction by combining Simple Moving Average, linear regression, Holt smoothing, and applying sentiment adjustment.
    prediction - package prediction
     
    Prediction - Class in prediction
    The Prediction class provides methods for generating stock price predictions using various algorithms such as Simple Moving Average (SMA), Linear Regression, Holtâ€™s Linear Exponential Smoothing, and a hybrid approach that combines these methods along with sentiment analysis adjustments.
    Prediction() - Constructor for class prediction.Prediction
     
    PredictionManager - Class in prediction
    The PredictionManager class manages the stock price prediction logic.
    PredictionManager() - Constructor for class prediction.PredictionManager
    Constructs a new PredictionManager, initializing the internal Prediction instance used for calculating stock price predictions.
    PredictionResult - Class in prediction
    The PredictionResult class extends StockData and represents the result of a stock price prediction.
    PredictionResult(String, String) - Constructor for class prediction.PredictionResult
    Constructs a PredictionResult with the given ticker symbol and prediction type.
    predictNextPriceLinearRegression(StockData) - Method in class prediction.Prediction
    Predicts the next stock price using linear regression over all available historical data.
    PricePoint - Class in data
    Represents a single data point for stock pricing on a specific date.
    PricePoint(LocalDate, double) - Constructor for class data.PricePoint
    Constructs a PricePoint with a specified date and price.
